title: Shine bright this Diwali with these essential makeup tips
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Janhvi Kapoor (@janhvikapoor) on Jun 19, 2019 at 12:08pm PDT



Make that pout count

A great way to decide on your entire beauty look is first deciding which lipstick you want to wear. Because let’s face it, we all have that one favourite lip colour that we trust completely that complements our skintone and make us feel amazing. Therefore, after you set your base, prep your lips with lip balm, and swipe on your favourite lipstick. If you are going in for a nude shade or a bold one, you can now understand how the colour looks on your lips and can accordingly build on the rest of your look without the anxiety of wondering how your makeup will turn out.
description: Follow these amazing makeup tips to slay that beauty game this Diwali Follow these amazing makeup tips to slay that beauty game this Diwali
